fs.title: Watcher
fs.desc: A full-stack neighborhood watch application built with MySQL Database and Express Server. Users can post their messages with their geolocation, and browse reports which are sorted by distances from the user's device.

fs.title: Eat Da Burger!
fs.desc: This Web Application uses MySQL database and Express server as Backend, and allows users to add burgers they want to devour.

fs.title: European Translation Map
fs.desc: This web application provides travelers and language enthusiasts alike a tool that translates words from english into several European languages and displays the translations according to their geographic location.

fs.title: Work Day Scheduler
fs.desc: A scheduler built with Javascript, stores and displays time shcedule for business hours of the current day

fs.title: Weather Dashboard
fs.desc: A web application shows the current weather and 5-day forecast of the user-chosen cities

fs.title: Password Generator
fs.desc: A Javascript application generates a random password based on user-selected critea

ml.title: Machine Learning Hands On
ml.desc: Github Repository for ML&DL notebook files
